metadata.title: CVE-2013-1951 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MediaWiki before 1.19.5 and 1.20.x before 1.20.4 and allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via Lua function names.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
